description: This objects is used for extref properties.
specification: This object represents the extref property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification at <url>.  Copyright (c) 2013, Avocent & Hewlett-Packard.  All rights reserved.

extref.description: This property is used for extrefs.
extref.specification: The value of this property shall be of the format for the reserved word *extref* as defined in the Redfish specification.
